title: Lots of Fun Things!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>*Inhale*, *Exhale*, *Inhale*, *Exhale*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Are you okay, Lanzhu-chan....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>My heart is pounding, and my body is fidgeting. Is this nervousness....? But, today is....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Lanzhu-chaaan, Emma-chaaan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Ayumu! We’re having a sleepover at your house today, right!? This is not a dream, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ahaha, that’s what we planned, wasn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m looking forward to seeing your room, Ayumu-chan. I made lots of meringue cookies, so let’s all eat together, alright~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! Lanzhu loves those cookies! Lanzhu can’t believe we get to eat Emma’s cookies in Ayumu’s room....!! Wait a minute, Lanzhu needs to calm down some more....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>You don’t have to be nervous. It’s just an ordinary room. Let’s hurry up so we can chat♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Come on, Lanzhu-chan, you’re going to be left behind~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>N-, no! Lanzhu wants to be the first one there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
